website_summaries.verdict: Classic wooden blocks that are safe for your toddler, but will grow with them and become a childhood favorite for years.
pros: This is a toy that will last
cons: Comes with a storage tray, but you have to fit the blocks in the tray like a puzzle, which is not the easiest for cleaning up quickly

website_summaries.verdict: This heavy duty set of blocks is solid enough to last for multiple children.
pros: Box can be used to build on

customer_reviews.title: Great for imagnative play
customer_reviews.text: Endless hours of creativity and fun. Our kids use these with their other toys: cars, trucks, trains, to create imaginative play scenarios.
customer_reviews.author: Mohadoha

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Some came chipped, so I threw those ones away. A couple days later I found my one year old playing with this one and I noticed another one chipped! Major choking hazard! Very dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wooden unit blocks!
customer_reviews.text: I love Melissa and Doug products and buy them often. I was so happy to find that they sell these unit blocks. They did not disappoint! These blocks are so versatile for children at many ages and stages and are fun to use with other toys, like little people, cars, dolls etc. The quality is excellent. I highly recommend these blocks for imaginative play as well as a great toy for math and hand-eye coordination. The amount of blocks included is good and they can be combined with other size blocks or you could purchase 2 sets for larger block structures.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth every penny! Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sick of spending $15-$25 on junk toys that either don't work or break or whatever. These blocks are about twice as expensive as other blocks here on Amazon. Go look at their reviews.. not machined well or don't lay flat. These blocks are expensive because every single block has been machined smooth and is uniform in shape and size. They could be passed down to future generations (or sold on marketplace for a pretty penny once your kid is done with them). 90% of people give 5 stars!!! Another 7% give 4 stars... that's all you need to know
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Funk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my four-year-old grandson. He had previously played with a set of these that my seven-year-old grandson has had for several years, so I thought he could use a set of his own, he seemed to enjoy them so much. He was so excited to get his own set! He and his 20 month old brother play with them a lot! These are very well-made. They are heavy blocks, but they will last forever. The kids build and rebuild, and knock it down, and build again. The blocks are very smooth and well-made. You will not regret getting these. I wish I had bought them much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Mammacita7

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: Kids have loved these blocks. We've had them going on 2 years now and all the pieces look the same as they did on the day we bought them. They come with a wooden box that neatly fits all the pieces so great for storage when its time to clean up. In addition to playing with just the blocks, the kids used these to build buildings along side their Thomas train tracks and tunnels and bridges --just a thought. We also had a Thomas that had batteries and pulled the rest of the trains through the tunnels and bridges these blocks built which was great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sahara

customer_reviews.title: Better than TV!
customer_reviews.text: These are larger and smoother than I expected! They are very high quality. My kids absolutely love them and I enjoy watching them play creatively with an open ended toy. I bought them for my 2 year old over a week ago. To my surprise, my 7 year old has played with them daily for about 3 hours a day. (We are still on summer break). These are fun for kids of all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: A toy that will grow with your child
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are fantastic. Yes, the price is somewhat steep, but if you think about how long you’ll be able to use these blocks and how great they’re made then it’s worth it. My 7 month old took to the blocks straight away chewing and manipulating them in her tiny hands. She loves watching me stack them and even tries to help put on on top of another. There are so many different shapes and sizes. I definitely think this will be a long-term toy that can grow with my child. I did remove the four smaller blocks for now, until my baby stops putting things in her mouth, in order to avoid a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: AJMama

customer_reviews.title: Really nice block set with great variety
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice, high-quality block set, our little 10-month-old already enjoys playing with the blocks and is learning to gently grab things by picking up one block from on top of another one without just knocking them both over by being too sloppy with her fingers. She also makes a little music holding too of the round pillar pieces and knocking them against each other :) We're so excited to see how much fun she has being creative and starting to build and arrange structures with these as she gets older. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonian

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, large, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Edit 1/25/20: Now that these have been opened and really played with we've noticed one block has purple crayon on it and another is cracked. Thinking we got a package that was previously returned which wouldn't bother us if they were all in great condition. I've reached out to Melissa and Doug and am waiting to hear back. Just received these blocks today. I ordered then for my son who will be 8 months old on Christmas. These are absolutely stunning blocks. So beautiful and the box they come in is a great bonus. They are nice and heavy too! Cannot wait for my son to get years of play with these!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Gross

customer_reviews.title: Seriously dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe no one mentioned how heavy these blocks are in the reviews here. The are heavy big blocks that could cause serious injury just by falling over after your kid builds a tower! These can break windows, cause concussion or even do fatal harm if you also have a baby in the house. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Blocks, Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Some of the blocks are chipped and discolored in the corners. Almost like they were wet at some point. Very poor quality. Especially for $50. My kids are loving playing with them so I am just going to weed through and toss the broken ones but I’m not happy I spent $50 on broken blocks. I’ll be going with Hape or another brand for our next set.
customer_reviews.author: MommyX8

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These are great blocks!! My 5 yr old and 1 yr old immediately opened them and have been playing with them since they arrived. The size is excellent. All the colors of the plastic toys were just too “loud” and visually stimulating.. it was actually stressing me out. I’m glad my kids can be creative with a more natural product.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan VanDerLeest

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my kids
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are great you for my 2 and 3.5 year old kids. Good way to get them to start stacking things. My older kid can stack a lot higher than my younger and even makes shapes like arrows. They do get little messy because there are so many pieces but I like my kids have so many pieces to play with. When they are done playing with them the blocks can be put back in the tray and put away. The blocks are study and the quality is good. All the edges are beveled so I don’t have to worry about any sharp edges. Great you to help my kids learn about balancing things.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these prior to Christmas for our young Grandsons. WOW, what a hit. They are such a great size, we really didn't need to purchase two, but they took one box home, and kept one here. It has been hours of fun for them AND all our extended family building with them. These remind me of blocks my grandfather made in the 60-70's and was exactly what we were looking for. The wood crate that holds them was an expected bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Romero

customer_reviews.title: not enough of the right blocks to really build. Super nice sanding jobs. Great storage box. Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: In general I am super impress with the build quality and sanding and the box it comes in. So on that end it gets 5 stars. Two main gripes blocks are a bit heavy and there aren’t enough long blocks to actually build something substantial with. You can build lots of two block houses, a square and a triangle but not much beyond that. I get upset when I’m building with my kids and have a hard time building towers or structures. It on my list to get more light wood from the hardware store and Make my own additional longer blocks to make this set complete.
customer_reviews.author: dmiggitymac

customer_reviews.title: Timeless, classic, durable and not an eye sore!!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are hands down the best blocks on the market!! They've been used and abused and still look as if they're barely loved. Amazing quality. Endless hours of play. Both my 3 and 1 year old play with them daily. Easy to look at because of it's neutral color. The only con would be that they're extremely heavy. Please be careful if allowing younger babies to play with them as they can hurt themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Two Girls

customer_reviews.title: Great quality large blocks
customer_reviews.text: At Christmas time I shopped around for quality blocks wanting the large sizes. Many of the blocks listed looked large but then when you dug deeper into the description, they were small blocks pictured to look large. It was a higher price than I wanted to spend but I anticipate that they will be well loved for a long time. They are of great quality and I would buy them again, plenty of different shapes and sizes. I questioned whether or not one set would be enough, which it is. If I had two kids routinely playing with them together I may think about getting 2 sets. They came very quickly and as a warning the box is heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set of blocks that will last
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing blocks for my 2 year old. They are larger than typical blocks you buy at the store so they are easier to stack. They also are really well sanded and have rounded edges which I love both from a safety perspective and an asthetic perspective. They are solid wood and heavy and will last for years. I also really like the box it comes it, the box is sturdy and can easily fit all the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Meg RTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome block set.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. A nice, heavy set with big, chunky blocks. It came really nicely packaged too, which was awesome because there wasn't a single nick or chip on the wooden box. You definitely get what you pay for. This isn't your average little block set. My son will have fun with this for hours. Melissa and Doug makes some awesome products and this one definitely didn't disappoint. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Manrique

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set, but very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of blocks. I wanted something with the least amount of paint or chemicals, and came across these. They stack well, are solid and heavy. My set didnt have any chipped blocks, and all had smooth and polished edges. They can be packed up nicely in the wooden box that they came in. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that they are incredibly heavy when all together in their wooden box. There's no way a toddler could move it around. I may stick with foam blocks for another year and get these back out when he's 4.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Once again Melissa & Doug product did not disappoint this grandma.
customer_reviews.text: Melissa and Doug once again did not disappoint this grandma. The quality of these blocks are high quality and better than expected. When they arrived in such a neatly stacked cube it made it all the easier to wrap it up for Christmas. The corners of the blocks are smoothly curved so no one gets hurt. The size of the blocks are bigger than what most stores have to offer. The plain wood is nice because I don't have to worry about paint.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyside365

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with blocks like these and I played with them all the time. When I saw these on amazon I knew I needed them for my son. He is 6 and would play on the tablet all day if we let him. He loves these blocks as they are big enough to construct huge towers and roads, bridges or just about anything else his mind can imagine. We just need to buy more now as all the other older kids always want to play with them too.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like high quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law has very high standards regarding items my grandson can play with, the original requested item was unavailable, so we asked her if Doug and Melissa was ok, she said yes. I did some research on them prior to asking and they seemed to be top quality. With her seal of approval I have to think these are great items too. we bought 2 sets
customer_reviews.author: nyc reader

customer_reviews.title: Styrofoam? Really?
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok but the amount of styrofoam the company uses for packaging is appalling. At this day and age, I’d expect a company like this to be a little more environmentally aware.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This block set contains many types of shapes to build various structures and engage creativity/critical thinking. The quality of the wood is fantastic, almost as good as other quality vendors who I have purchased from before to use in group care settings. Right now, my son (1.5 yrs) likes to stack a couple on top of one another and carry them from place to place to see what they might balance on, but I'm excited that he'll be able to grow with this material as he gets older. Recommend for all ages of children who are developmentally ready to use (and not throw because they have some decent weight to them).
customer_reviews.author: lady_quinn56

customer_reviews.title: What wooden blocks should be
customer_reviews.text: This block set is identical to the Playskool block set I had as a child. They are slightly finished and large enough for younger children to build larger structures. I bought two sets so that children can play together while using their smaller cars and dolls to have adventures in the towns they build.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M

customer_reviews.title: Good, Solid Wood; Well-Constructed; and Good Variety of Shapes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two sets of these as a gift from his grandfather for our toddler son this spring. I had a large set of Playskool wooden blocks when I was kid, but the modern versions are colored, smaller, and have odd shpes includes, so we gravitated toward them. When our son was just a year, at the time of purchase, he was not so interested. Now he's more into constructing, so this is a fun set for him.
customer_reviews.author: Erik K.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Solid Blocks - Great for 6-10 yr-olds
customer_reviews.text: These are great building blocks. They are all solid wood and come in various shapes and sizes. The edges and corners have been smoothed. This is a great gift for kids. (*Note: Since these blocks are solid wood, they're heavy when grouped together. The shipping box will not be light.)
customer_reviews.author: D. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, must have!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (2 and 5) absolutely love these blocks, even after a year. They build and tear down and build and tear down for hours. Easy to pick up and store in the box they come in. I just ordered a second set so they can build bigger and more elaborate structures. I did take out the largest two blocks because they tend to become weapons, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Best wooden blocks out there!
customer_reviews.text: We researched a lot before choosing these wooden blocks. I love that they are not painted and that there are no sharp edges. They come in a nice wooden storage box so that the box can be put away nicely after they are played with. Our 4 year old has had such a blast building and creating different things with these blocks! They are worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: tedd jewell

customer_reviews.title: Set for years of play!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice building set for the kids as the parts are not too small. Comes in a heavy box and you can find a peace of foam block there too.At first i thought that one block was missing from the box and shipped it back as on the pictures looked like box should be all filled with blocks. But that is how it should be - foam block there. Do not panic as I did))))
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good blocks make a good "clink clink" sound
customer_reviews.text: Got these blocks for my godson for Christmas. Searched around a lot, did the research, still was a little nervous to buy online. Wasn't sure they'd have that "clink-clink" sound that good quality blocks have. Was not dissapoineed. Super good 'clink' outta these blocks. He might even like them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Talarocafella

customer_reviews.title: Best set of building blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Far and away, this is the best present my 2 year old son got for Christmas. Even his 6 year old sister and her friends love to build castles for her Barbies. They're very sturdy and the box they come in has handles for easy pick up. Blocks are smooth with rounded edges. 60 is just enough for a few kids to play together without fighting over pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Alie

customer_reviews.title: Not enough standard and double units
customer_reviews.text: The blocks we received are of good quality. However, I am disappointed and surprised by the variety and quantity of the different types of unit blocks we received. There are only 4 standard unit blocks and 2 double unit blocks. These are the two main kinds of blocks that will create any kind of structure. Most of the rest of the blocks are for special features and embellishments. This may hinder your children’s play as it does mine. I am going to have some of just these two sizes made for us. I wish I would have saved up and gone for a more expensive but better thought out set.
customer_reviews.author: Megan T

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lots of shapes and sizes of blocks
customer_reviews.text: I had a starter set of Melissa and Doug blocks for my granddaughter but now that she is 4, I thought she needed more blocks. I ordered these because they have their own container (a box) to hold them when not in use. When she noticed these at my house, her eyes got big and she said "Wow!" We got them out and have used them a few times now. She is learning quite a bit by building things with these blocks. They were packaged inside a box lined with Styrofoam for shipment. This protected their wooden box without being overkill on packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Pragmatist

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them! They started playing with them right away, and drag them out all the time. One of their favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Purchased in 2011 for Gabriel.  Now (2020) Samuel is using them.
customer_reviews.text: Blocks still in great condition after 9 years in humid environment. Samuel is 1.5 years old and is using these now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these blocks.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece, age 7, and am very happy with them, as is she. Traditional, sturdy blocks of many shapes invite creativity, imagination, planning, and problem solving. The ultimate interactive toy. I love seeing what she builds with them, and how that interweaves with the themes of her play.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Ok.  You may want 2 sets if you are planning on that photo.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you think it would be. Not as many blocks as it would look like. Probably going to need a second set. However the size of them is lovely. No choking hazards here. The blocks are well done, smooth, no splinters. No pokes. And they go back into the bin with ease. No I'm not paid or discounted for a review. So far the blocks have been a ramp for cars, a castle, a highway, drum sticks, and a pony barn. Kinda like that they aren't colored. So there's no "I WANTED THE PINK ONE" tantrums at the end of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Daria B. Kaval

customer_reviews.title: The only blocks you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: Thee blocks offer hours of entertainment. They are smooth cornered and solid wood. Plenty of blocks for more than one child to enjoy! My daughter likes to draw on them with crayons (faces or designs) and I can easily wipe them down with one of those white magic sponges. The box is really heavy when full but that's what you get with real wood :). Oh and they smell like fresh cut wood..... I love that smell :)
customer_reviews.author: Connie Herod

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my grandsons
customer_reviews.text: They do legos and other building things but these blocks at an early age seem to address a fundamental desire they have to build things, stack things, create things and sometimes throw things. And I think all of that is important. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Aubry

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for young kids
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for young kids, especially children young enough to put these in their mouths. Unpainted wooden toys are best for young kids and they are cleanly made in the USA. I watched my child's creativity play out many times with these blocks. Best of all they facilitate play with other toys, such as building a house for the doll or making a car ramp, so they never get old for your child. I bought more than one set just to watch the creations grow larger.
customer_reviews.author: Blithe

customer_reviews.title: High Quality childrens building bloks
customer_reviews.text: I found Building wood blocks for children (3+) almost impossible to find, except for Amazon. My only concern is/was that the blocks are too smooth. I have, prefer, wood building blocks for children purchased 30 years ago that are not smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: I like these more than my kids
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I had more fun with these blocks than my kids did. They are still young though (2 and 3.5) so they'll grow into using these more creatively. The blocks are a good size and easy to put back in the box. No complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: buy a second set!
customer_reviews.text: We need a second set! These were a Christmas gift for my 3 kids- ages 3, 7, & 7. They have built a horse stable, manger, castles, roads...you name it. I can see these being something that I keep for future grandkids. I'm pretty sure the picture shows two sets....that was the only disappointment...there's not enough. Still well worth what I paid (lightning deal.) Wish I could get catch them on sale so I could buy a second set!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Will more than pay for itself over time.
customer_reviews.text: We've had several sets of these over the years and our kids still use them to this day. Great bang for your buck. Unlike the plastic cheap toys that are trotted out in commercials, these will last for full child usage. I would caution those with wood floors as our wood floor did get a bit of a beating from these (falling towers, etc). A flat cover that once was used to cover a sand table was put to use as a building surface over a rug to save our poor floors. This year I added a couple of sets of the Architectural blocks to add to the mix. All in all, great investment for years of building.
customer_reviews.author: JKReads

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite Toy!
customer_reviews.text: In today's world of structured, single purpose, do-it-one-way toys, the classic blocks are a standout. Our 3-year old daughter loves playing with these blocks... and they are fun for Daddy too! They are full-size blocks and did not have any weird odors. We like having the wooden case to put them in when we are done playing. The only downside to this set is that you quickly run out of big blocks to bring to life big ideas. The only thing I would do different is to order a set with more pieces, or to order a few more sets... which I'm likely to do soon!
customer_reviews.author: John Richter

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My 7, 5, and 1 year olds prefer Legos, magnatiles, magformers, and foam blocks to these. I think they’ve played with them once since I bought them for Christmas. Waste of money and a big/messy toy to store
customer_reviews.author: Mic Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great toys!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to get a set of blocks like this for my 3 and 5 year old for a while now. These are great, heavy duty blocks and the bin they come in takes a beating too. My kids love to turn the bin over and use it as a base for ever larger and more intricate houses, castles, and "Jedi schools." I have fun tetrising them back into the bin. If you don't just throw them back they do all easily fit in their. I recommend them to all my friends. M&D has yet to let me down, the kids always love any Melissa and Doug toy I get them.
customer_reviews.author: hooked

customer_reviews.title: A classic to help kids channel their imagination
customer_reviews.text: This is a definite favorite in my house. It does't matter what the age group, kids just seem to gravitate towards these blocks. They spend hours building forts, houses, castles and whatever else comes to their imagination. Some also enjoy packing them away neatly so that they fit into the wooden box provided. Beware though, if you have younger kids, these blocks are heavy and if a fight breaks out, you will have to remove it for fear of injury as I have had to do on occasion. But, this a great educational, classic toy that helps kids channel their amazing imagination.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks
customer_reviews.text: Great blocks, heavy duty, alot of fun to play with and I love the bin they come in. I need to order another set.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good blocks. One complaint I have is that they ...
customer_reviews.text: Good blocks. One complaint I have is that they are potentially dangerous. When my kid is having a melt down tantrum, these are potentially destructive if they are thrown. Melissa and Doug, could you make wooden blocks that are not dangerous when thrown? (On a serious note - these are well made and high quality. I'm happy we have them. I'm not happy that they are heavy when I have to cart all of them out of the room during a time out. Oh well, you cannot win everything).
customer_reviews.author: Cholla Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 18-month-old
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to give these to my daughter for Christmas! The set is much larger than I expected, and the wood pieces are nicely crafted. I have a feeling she will be playing with these for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: Well thought-out, wonderfully executed block set
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these blocks. What a freaking deal! And they come in their own box. We are a family of construction addicts and every time one of the "builders" is playing blocks with the kiddo some comment happens like "whoa, these are really high quality! can you imagine the time it would take to make this set?!?" We approve. Would perhaps buy another set because the dogs keep grabbing them and chewing them. But they are finely sanded and comfy to the touch. We love this set and it sits proudly in our living room, daily.
customer_reviews.author: Accountant

customer_reviews.title: I have a set in the children's waiting room.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pediatric psychologist. I have a set in the children's waiting room. It is perfect. Right size and weight. Smooth. Comes with its own wooden opened case which makes it easy for the kids to clean up. I also bought a set for my 2 year old. We are going to bring out the set again in another 6-12 months.
customer_reviews.author: DrDad

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of the blocks I had as a child!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are awesome!!! I was looking for some big blocks for my toddler and these are perfect. They are solid wood and remind me of the blocks I had as a child. The smell is so good! Real wood. Just wholesome pure fun. He is almost two and loves his blocks. I'm sure these will continue to get loads of use in the years to come from my son and his baby sister.
customer_reviews.author: happymama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and quantity!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks ROCK, Melissa and Doug hardly disappoint us ever. The pieces are solid and have no sharp edges. We let our son open it as an early Christmas present and he plays with it for hours and we play with him. Almost thinking about buying another set for even bigger creations!
customer_reviews.author: jasmine cooksey

customer_reviews.title: after dirt, sticks, rocks, empty amazon boxes and a ball, THIS should be your kid's next toy.
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC. Fun, light... my boy built a tower taller than he, and when they toppled several hit his head, and he barely flinched -- the lightweight wood and slightly rounded corners make these M&D blocks about as dangerous to one's noggin as a roll of toilet paper. And with the cool wood crate, it's actually FUN to pack these up when the day is done (there's enough extra space that you don't have to "plan" how you'll stack the blocks inside... unlike his Legos which never seem to fit in the containers they came in...)
customer_reviews.author: Unarmed Apple Purveyor

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy these are perfect! I bought another set of blocks and returned them before I bought these! So happy that I did because these are large and great quality! I absolutely love the wood box they come in too! So handy for storage!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole r

customer_reviews.title: Timeless, creative toy goes beyond value
customer_reviews.text: We could not be any happier with these blocks. My 18-month old already LOVES them and I can't wait to see him grow into them as he learns how to build and use his imagination. This is the kind of toy that promotes creative, open-ended play that is worth a thousand plastic push-button toys. I know they will be in our family for years and years. I love how smooth these blocks are. They are wonderful quality and such a great price (although I noticed they went 50% off over Black Friday, which would have made it even better!)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Everyone with children needs this in their home!
customer_reviews.text: We are still playing with these....years down the road! Every house with kids needs this. We build all kinds of things, for example: table and chairs for action figures, a castle for Disney princesses or shopkins playground. When the kids were younger built towers....you build them to destroy them, lol! We also time each other to see how fast we can put it away. 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful blocks, great for the imagination
customer_reviews.text: Nearly 5 years later and still going strong! We got a set of these for our little boy when he was 1, he's 6 now and still builds with these all the time. We've purchased 2 additional sets throughout the last few years and he wants even more for Christmas this year, so I'm going to get him another set or 2. These are wonderful blocks, great for the imagination, and will last many years. Once our son outgrows them they will be put up and saved for our grandchildren someday. :-)
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks with great quality and great value.
customer_reviews.text: We got a great deal on these blocks. Kids love them and have consistantly play with them at least 2-3 times per week since receiving them as a Christmas gift three months ago. Blocks were well sanded with no splinters so far. Very durable with no complaints so far. Kids are happy, wife is happy, so would buy again. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Coyot21

customer_reviews.title: These are REALLY NICE blocks!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the wood in this block set is excellent and the edges are smoothed very nicely. I got these for my toddler because they reminded me of a set I had when I was growing up... They are way better than I expected though! The quality and weight of the wood is so much nicer in person than you can tell from the photos and my son loves them, which is the ultimate test.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Best blocks!
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are awesome! Very durable, high quality and the box they come in is very convenient. We've had ours for a year and they're still a favorite toy! Everything is still in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Filled in drill holes. Generally poor quality. Can’t build anything.
customer_reviews.text: Standard units are not precise enough to build anything over 6-8 inches high. Wood is good quality but the lack of quality control ruins it. These are too expensive to be so poorly executed. There are even filled in drill holes on some of the blocks.
customer_reviews.author: dpat

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy, but Poor Quality Control.
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving blocks initial thoughts were, wow! These must be great quality...this box is HEAVY! But then, I look to find out at least two of the blocks look damaged to me. I have yet to completely unpack. For $50+ I want my kids to be the only reason they are damaged. Not because they came that way.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive - but a great set of blocks
customer_reviews.text: A little hesitate to purchase such an expensive set of blocks but very happy we did! They have smooth finish and have a nice assortment of shapes and sizes. Just purchased and gifted a second set of these blocks for my godsons first birthday, great quality blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Brittany Tshudy

customer_reviews.title: Great set of blocks
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice set of blocks -they are very sturdy and remind me of blocks from "the old days" ! We'll have these around for a long time I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Broken in a month
customer_reviews.text: Unsafe product!!! Parents beware! One of the blocks broke in two pieces after less than a month and a splinter from the rough broken edges got into my child's hand. I attached the pictures. Stay away from this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yi Shu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item...
customer_reviews.text: love, love, love this!! Incredibly well made and finished. worth a lot more. Our 9 month old got a hold of these and just loves them constantly...
customer_reviews.author: Larry B

customer_reviews.title: Six years of play and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I found a set of very similar blocks at a yard sale for my daughter when she was two years old. They have been used weekly,sometimes daily for the last six years. Now I have three children,ages 8,4 and 2 and the arguing for the blocks was growing. I bought a set of these Melissa and Doug unit blocks and my kids went right to work,expanding their towers,houses,pizza shops. Quality,wooden blocks are worth the small investment for my childrens' imagination and my golden opportunity to call a friend and clean the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Sensational
customer_reviews.text: There are not enough positive words to express about these blocks. Have purchased for my godkids, friends' children, as well as my own son. They are durable, good size/weight, and excellent quality. The blocks are sanded smooth with slightly rounded edges (to minimize sharp points). The box is a great storage spot -- excellent learning for smaller children (hand-eye coordination for picking particular pieces) to older children (arranging in patterns to fit all blocks into box). My blocks have been tossed, lost under couches, drooled/teethed, knocked over and rebuilt numerous times. I LOVE these blocks!
customer_reviews.author: ACKeenan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this set
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this set. They are smooth, with enough sizes to please. Our 2 1/2 granddaughter loves to build and while I was concerned they might be too old for her, she played with them every day. I feel they will last and give her several more years of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle and coffee

customer_reviews.title: Back to the Basics
customer_reviews.text: Every child should have a wooden block set. Hours of creative fun. No batteries. Nothing to break. Different every time they pull it out to play. The quality of the wood blocks is excellent. They are heavy and big. Each block has been carefully cut and sanded and all the edges are smooth for little hands. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Bower

customer_reviews.title: Build fine motor skills, excellent quality, use imagination
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Great blocks for hours of fun! Just bring your imagination! Good for building fine motor skills. These will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Get sandpaper
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for splinters. May require sanding on your part before letting the littles play.
customer_reviews.author: Trammell

customer_reviews.title: The perfect toy
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect for my grandkids who love them and they are even exciting to their parents who have truly fond memories playing with wood blocks as children and now they share it with their own kids.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nicely finished 👍
customer_reviews.text: I was most impressed by the smoothness of the block set. My daughter said that her kindergarten class had the same set. She loves it for her class and now one for her children.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K

customer_reviews.title: Exactly Like the Blocks you Remember
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what we were looking for. Our two year old loves them. They remind me of the blocks we had as kids -- plane jane so there is tons of room for imagination. The blocks are well made so he can easily build with them (same shape/height/size). The storage box is awesome as well. We purchased them with the Melissa and Doug wooden car/sign set and he likes to make towns and roads with the blocks to drive the trucks through.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are the full size style blocks, not the tabletop size blocks sold at a popular toy store. We bought both styles for our two year old grandson and he prefers to play with these, even though the smaller block set has the primary color finish. These larger blocks also come in a sturdy wood box, with open area on sides for my fingers to slide into for easy transport. It also has a clear plastic top to keep things tidy when putting away when not in use. I'm considering buying a second set, because each time I've pulled them out for my grandson to play with, the adults start building their own block creations! Hahahaha
customer_reviews.author: A fan of classics,

customer_reviews.title: A Timeless Classic Children's toy that is fun, durable and practical
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our granddaughter who turned 3. Her mom really wanted them for her. These blocks have been around for many years and they are still very popular and a great learning item for children. The quality of the item is great and I love the box that it comes in. The clear plastic cover could be improved upon as it will have to be tossed almost immediately . It would be nice if they had a clear plexi piece that could slide closed. That would be my only requested improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T.

customer_reviews.title: Excited for toddler to grow with these blocks
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 15 month old daughter and right now she is playing with different shapes, knocking down the structures we build, and is attempting to stack them. She even puts the pieces to her ear and talks as if she is on the phone. She will wander away and come back to pick up a piece and fiddle with it. We are looking forward to seeing her grow with this classic toy. It is also fun to build alongside her and come up with new designs constantly after she sits, kicks, or waves away things we build. I would list 5 stars if the price was lower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We love these blocks! They are perfect for our toddler who loves to build towers and then "knock it down!" They are just the size we were looking for and I can see them lasting for a very long time because of how well they are made. They did have sort of a strange odor for a few days upon unpacking them, sort of like apple cider vinegar. But that has gone away now.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the imap
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set for all my grandkids I remember my blocks as a kid and was glad to see how much they like it A timeless gift for them that allows creativity and fun
customer_reviews.author: citymima

customer_reviews.title: It comes in a wooden box that's perfect for storing them
customer_reviews.text: We bought these blocks 3 years ago and the kid still plays with them regularly. It comes in a wooden box that's perfect for storing them. You get to do a little Tetris to fit them all in but that actually makes cleaning up fun. There's a good variety of shapes and sizes so the limits of what you can build is your imagination. They are solid wood so they'll last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy and quality toy you wont be sending to the dump in 12 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought these on a lightening deal and they are great value. Our kids have had a lot of fun with them so far but it is to be expected that they are very heavy...my son demolishing his twins sisters castle with his foam Thor's hammer resulted in some heavy blocks being flung about. They will need help carrying them into a play space so maybe not suitable for toddlers but they feel lovely and a quality toy I think they will enjoy for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: The British Grapple Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Lifelong Blocks! Excellent Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST blocks ever! My grandsons (ages 3 and 5) love them! I love helping them build things with them! They are good sturdy, solid blocks! They will have them all through their lives and whoever is lucky enough to take them as an adult his kids will love them too! They come in a good solid wooden tray/box. I'm very happy I purchased these blocks for them! Every time they play with them their imagination grows with all the different things to build and play with! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna801

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: These have a great feel to them, and they're a great size. Had a bit of a smell when we first opened them but it went away quickly. Our baby is only one but she enjoys knocking down towers. I love how solid they feel and the storage box is very solid and beautifully made.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Gustad

customer_reviews.title: These blocks are the best. Simply put...the best!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Are these great blocks or what?! Completely smooth sanded, raw wood blocks. There are many versatile sizes and shapes to keep kids busy for hours. At least mine! They love building. These blocks come with their own case where they all fit back in easily. We have had ours now for over 3 years and we love them. We have kept them through the years because they can always be used by kids of many different ages during all sorts of imaginative play. Melissa & Doug products are the best and I am completely satisfied with every product I have ever purchased from them.
customer_reviews.author: TinkerZeus

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to find blocks that are not plastic or painted. I love these. Of the highest quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Frederic Tate

customer_reviews.title: I'm so excited that my boys love these blocks
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited that my boys love these blocks. Its been a challenge to get them interested in building block. Blocks were one of my favorite pastimes as s child, and I always thought it'd be an experience that I would get to share with my kids. These blocks are big and that works great for their ages (2 and 3). The boys use the block for everything from castles to race tracks for their monster trucks. There are barely enough blocks for the both of them to share, and we may end up expanding with another set. This is a great set, and a wonderful addition to our home preschool.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: BAD A_ _ BLOCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of these for the grandson. One went home with mom and dad and one stayed at mimi and papa's house. They are his favorite toy at both places. Maybe he'll stay in construction like his papa? These are quality made. No rough edges. He even shares them with 12 month old cousin. They are big enough he wont choke and sturdy enough, he won't break. Highly recommend for hours of fun and entertainment for those aspiring builders of years to come.
customer_reviews.author: RLD 1427Top Contributor: Welding

customer_reviews.title: It's so hard to find just good old fashion bigger size blocks for kids to play ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find just good old fashion bigger size blocks for kids to play with. These are perfect. The storage box is nice but way to heavy for my grandson to carry but great nonetheless. A lid would work some or a nice canvas bag. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Varner

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly impressed with the quality of both the blocks and the wooden crate. Blocks are heavy and very well sanded. So much so that they barely soaked up any of the Watco Dark Walnut Danish Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Substantially Sized Blocks!  :-)
customer_reviews.text: THESE blocks are fantastic! FINALLY ... a set that is substantial in size! We are so impressed with these, we ordered another set. I do not recommend getting the Melissa & Doug 200 piece set... they are too small. THIS set is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Tilson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT set
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about these blocks! EXACTLY what I was looking for - good, heavy weight. Sturdy. Hold up to toddlers. Nice quality wood. Highly recommended if you're in the market for a blocks set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, smooth edges, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My kids play with these daily and they are worth every penny. They are durable with smooth edges, fit together nicely, and store in the original wooden box. They also work well with the Melissa & Doug Architectural blocks we just purchased giving them lots of blocks for many creations.
customer_reviews.author: A_Belle

customer_reviews.title: A favorite toy in our house
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are a favorite in our house! They are smooth, and I love that they aren't bright colors. They aren't cut perfectly, so sometimes our towers don't quite work out the way I expect ;) I also wish there were more of the large pieces. There are so many little blocks in this set! There must not be any finish on these, because my daughters juice leaked onto one block, and now we have a partially red block. I'd buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Standard Unit Blocks
product_meta.description:
This traditional set of 60 solid-wood standard unit building blocks with a natural finish and smooth rounded edges is beautiful in its simplicity – and a great value! The blocks come in a lovely wooden crate for easy and convenient storage. Precisely measured and cut, these carefully-crafted blocks will inspire children to build, stack, and use their imaginations to make all sorts of structures. Playing with blocks helps develop fine- and gross-motor skills, problem solving, and more. And let’s face it, it’s also endlessly fun to simply watch kids build towers and knock them down! Our Standard Unit Solid-Wood toy blocks come with a handsome wooden crate, which is not only convenient for simple storage, but also helps to teach children organizational skills. This package of wooden blocks includes 60 pieces, with packaging that measures 5.25" H x 12.5" W x 15" L. Our blocks make a great gift for kids ages 3 to 8 years. Add the Melissa & Doug See & Spell Learning Toy for even more developmental learning fun. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.

AMAZON.COM
Melissa & Doug

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!

See more
feature_bullets: BUILDING BLOCKS FOR CHILDREN: The Melissa & Doug Standard Unit Solid-Wood Building Blocks are comprised of 60 natural-finished, smooth-sanded hardwood blocks, inspiring screen-free play.

MULTIPLE DEVELOPMENTAL BENEFITS: Our blocks for imaginative play are ideal for introducing early math concepts, including shapes, parts-to-whole, and sorting. They also help to develop hand-eye coordination and teach patience.
PACKAGED FOR EASY STORAGE: Sixty natural-finish, smooth-sanded hardwood unit Melissa & Doug building blocks are packaged in a handsome wooden crate for easy storage.

GREAT GIFT FOR AGES 3 TO 8: The Standard Unit Solid-Wood toy blocks with storage crate makes a great gift for kids ages 3 to 8 years. Add the Melissa & Doug See & Spell Learning Toy for even more developmental learning fun.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News calls “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest-quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we'll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
